# Sicut rosa

Sicut rosa inter spinas illis addit speciem,
sic venustat suam Virgo Maria progeniem:
germinavit enim florem,
qui vitalem dat odorem.
 As a rose amid thorns adds to theirs its beauty
so does Maiden Mary grace her own child
for she has put forth a flower
that grows with a vital fragrance.
